thread.section_title: St. James' Court, A Taj Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Superb location and highly rated room
thread.title_full: Superb location and highly rated room - Review of St. James' Court, A Taj Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: TyneTourist
title: Superb location and highly rated room
text: The excellent location of St James's Court manages to cater equally for business and leisure. We have stayed here three times now and always allocated an excellent room with good amenities. Only eaten in 'Bank' on one occasion but rated the food highly. One criticism would be the price of breakfast!
